ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Child: When I feel scared or worried about something, I try not to go near it / Parent: s/he tries to get away from it
Notes: 0=never, almost never, or not an issue ; 1=sometimes ; 2=often ; 3=almost always

ElementDescription: When I feel scared or worried about something, I try not to think about it
When I feel scared or worried about something, I feel scared until I get away from it

Child: When I feel scared or worried about something, I ask my parent(s) if I can do something else / Parent: When my child feels scared or worried about something, s/he asks if s/he can do something else
Notes: 0=never, almost never, or not an issue ; 1=sometimes ; 2=often ; 3=almost always

ElementDescription: Child: When I feel scared or worried about something, I try to avoid it / Parent: When my child feels scared or worried about something, s/he tries to avoid it
Notes: 0=never, almost never, or not an issue ; 1=sometimes ; 2=often ; 3=almost always

ElementDescription: When I feel scared or worried about something, I refuse to do it

Child: When I feel scared or worried about something, I think it is best to stay away from it / Parent: When my child feels scared or worried about something, s/he tells me s/he wants to stay away from it
Notes: 0=never, almost never, or not an issue ; 1=sometimes ; 2=often ; 3=almost always

ElementDescription: Child: When I feel scared or worried about something, I try to stay away from it / Parent: When my child feels scared or worried about something, s/he tries not to go places where it is
Notes: 0=never, almost never, or not an issue ; 1=sometimes ; 2=often ; 3=almost always

ElementDescription: When my child feels scared or worried about something, s/he asks if s/he can do it later
Notes: 0=never, almost never, or not an issue; 1=sometimes ; 2=often ; 3=almost always

ElementDescription: When my child feels scared or worried about something, s/he asks me to take care of it for him/her
Notes: 0=never, almost never, or not an issue ; 1=sometimes ; 2=often ; 3=almost always

ElementDescription: When my child feels scared or worried about something, s/he says s/he will not be able to handle it
Notes: 0=never, almost never, or not an issue; 1=sometimes ; 2=often ; 3=almost always

ElementDescription: Child Avoidance Measure Self Report
Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
